projects.title: Fitcoin

projects.title: Personality Pixie
projects.description: An AI-driven mobile app that analyzes user behavior to provide personality insights and daily affirmations.

experiences.description: Leading development of enterprise web applications and AI integrations.
achievements: Architected and deployed a microservices-based platform serving 50k+ users.
Integrated LLMs to automate customer support, reducing ticket volume by 40%.
Mentored junior developers and established code quality standards.

experiences.description: Researched and implemented computer vision models for industrial automation.
achievements: Developed a defect detection model with 98% accuracy using PyTorch.
Optimized model inference time by 3x using TensorRT.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy models to edge devices.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with Honors. Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Software Engineering. Led the university coding club and organized 3 hackathons.
